question: This country will host the 15th Asia Media Summit with the theme of Telling our Stories Asia and More.
explanation: India would be hosting the 15th Asia Media Summit (AMS-2018) in New Delhi. The theme of this summit is "Telling our Stories Asia and More". The summit mainly aims to provide a unique opportunity to the broadcasters in Asia to share their thoughts on broadcasting and information. The annual summit will be organized by Asia-Pacific Institute for Broadcasting Development (AIBD) in collaboration with its partners and international organizations.
